Package org.jconfigurations.source

Contains the ConfigurationSource interface and its implementations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigurationSource
    Interface that decouples the source of configurations from this library's design.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JdbcConfigurationSource
    ConfigurationSource implementation that reads configurations from JDBC interfaces.
    MapConfigurationSource
    Handy helper class that wraps a Map into a ConfigurationSource, making sure that MapConfigurationSource.configurations() returns an unmodifiable map.
    PropertiesConfigurationSource
    Handy helper class that wraps up a Properties into a ConfigurationSource.

Package org.jconfigurations.source Description

 Contains the ConfigurationSource interface and its implementations.
